sentences: Eizo Sakamoto (坂本 英三, Sakamoto Eizō, also credited as さかもと えいぞう Sakamoto Eizō, born February 23, 1964) is a Japanese musician, singer and songwriter who was born in Nishinomiya, Hyōgo Prefecture.
In the 1990s he started up the band Animetal which performed heavy metal covers of anime and tokusatsu opening and closing themes.
